Crimes.Nature_of_Acts: Assisting the PKK, a designated terrorist organization
Crimes.Admission_or_Involvement: Mr. Suleyman admitted assisting the PKK
Crimes.Individual_Behavior: Provided assistance to a terrorist organization
Crimes.Nature_of_Membership: Support role, not specified as leadership
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Admission by individual, extrinsic evidence referenced
Crimes.Key_Evidence_Issue: Extrinsic evidence not disclosed to applicant
Crimes.Evidence_Credibility: Credible based on admission and designation of PKK
Evidence_Issues: Lack of disclosure of extrinsic evidence
Crimes.Authority_Decision: Found inadmissible due to involvement with terrorist organization
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Failure to provide 'window' for Ministerial relief or disclose evidence
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness_Issue: Whether notice and disclosure were required

Crimes.Crime_Name: Membership in an organization engaging in subversion by force of a government
Crimes.Nature_of_Acts: Assisting the PKK in armed conflict against Turkish government
Crimes.Admission_or_Involvement: Mr. Suleyman admitted assisting the PKK
Crimes.Individual_Behavior: Supported an organization using armed force against a government
Crimes.Key_Evidence_Issue: No disclosure of extrinsic evidence used
Crimes.Evidence_Credibility: High, based on admission and official listing
Evidence_Issues: Lack of transparency in evidence use
Crimes.Authority_Decision: Found inadmissible due to membership in subversive organization
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Whether obligation to notify or disclose existed

Crimes.Crime_Name: Subversion by force of a government
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Interpretation of 'subversion by force' under IRPA
Crimes.Application_Facts: Mr. Suleyman assisted the PKK, which used armed force against the Turkish government
Crimes.Remedy_Requested: Judicial review of visa officer’s decision
Crimes.Claimant_Status: Foreign national seeking entry to Canada
Crimes.Defendant_Behavior: Visa officer found applicant inadmissible without providing opportunity for Ministerial relief
Crimes.Grounds_for_Claim: Alleged procedural unfairness and legal error
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Procedural fairness and reasonableness of decision
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Lack of 'window' for Ministerial relief and non-disclosure of evidence
Crimes.Evidence_Used: Applicant's admission, official designation of PKK
Crimes.Application_Basis: Engagement in subversion by force via support to PKK
Crimes.Evidence_Assessed: Admission of support to armed group
Crimes.Governing_Rule: IRPA s. 34(1)(b): Inadmissibility for subversion by force
Crimes.Cause_Description: Involvement with PKK led to inadmissibility concerns
Crimes.Evidence_Handling: Relied on admission; extrinsic evidence not disclosed
Crimes.Evidence_Assessment: Sufficient basis for decision based on admission
Crimes.Decision_Rationale: Procedural fairness met; legal interpretation correct
